snippet: The Republicans said they were protesting what they called an inadequate response by the nominee, Gina McCarthy, to more than 1,000 written questions.
abstract: Senate Republicans continue campaign to delay confirmation of Pres Obama's second-term cabinet nominees, blocking committee vote on Gina McCarthy, Obama's pick to lead Environmental Protection Agency.
lead_paragraph: The Republicans said they were protesting what they called an inadequate response by the nominee, Gina McCarthy, to more than 1,000 written questions.

headline.seo: Republicans Block Vote on Nominee to Lead E.P.A.
headline.main: Senate Republicans Block Committee Vote on Obama’s Nominee to Lead E.P.A.
headline.print_headline: Senate Republicans Block Committee Vote on Obama’s Nominee to Lead E.P.A.
